void GrDelay (GR_TIMEOUT msecs)
 This function suspends execution of the program for the specified number of milliseconds.

Function Documentation

void GrDelay (  GR_TIMEOUT  msecs  ) 
 

This function suspends execution of the program for the specified number of milliseconds.

Parameters:
msecs Number of milliseconds to delay.
